content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.aboba-ip-config'> <front> <title>Principles of Internet Host Configuration</title>  <author initials='B' surname='Aboba' fullname='Bernard Aboba'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='D' surname='Thaler' fullname='Dave Thaler'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='L' surname='Andersson' fullname='Loa  Andersson'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='October' day='11' year='2007' />  <abstract><t>This document describes principles of Internet host configuration. It covers issues relating to configuration of Internet layer parameters, as well as parameters affecting higher layer protocols.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-aboba-ip-config-05' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-aboba-ip-config-05.txt' /> </reference>
